description:
Assistant Raikage. Negative thinking that is negative and takes things seriously remains the same.
In the case of Hashirama Senju, he was investigating with his subordinates Marui and Kakui in order to scout the silent country at the order of Darui, but he encountered Bolts chasing the quadruple of Kasumi and shared information and cooperated. Offer. He engages with Deepa, who he encounters during the chase, and stops, but after being defeated, his subordinates who plead for his own life are killed.
name: Omoi
